# coder server postgres-builtin-serve

Run the built-in PostgreSQL deployment.

## Usage

```console
coder server postgres-builtin-serve [flags]
```

## Flags

### --raw-url

Output the raw connection URL instead of a psql command.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default | <code>false</code> |
